title: The Echo Protocol Unleashed
outcome: Three days after the BCI’s collapse, remnants of Halden’s code activate the mysterious 'Echo Protocol,' a backup system designed to adapt to collective behavior rather than algorithmic control. As city life reorganizes autonomously, factions battle to shape this evolving order, exposing Halden’s final vision and rewriting Stenograd's social contract.

events.description: Remnants of Halden’s code activate the 'Echo Protocol,' sending subtle guidance to public screens and devices, urging cooperation and calm without assigning scores.
Neighborhoods begin self-organizing resource sharing and dispute solving, ignoring previous BCI categories. Unexpected communities flourish, some bypassing all remaining Council oversight.
Innovators discover a message buried in the Echo Protocol: Halden predicted BCI’s collapse and saw this new chaos as a vital step toward civic rebirth.
The Directorate attempts to override the Echo Protocol to restore order but rapidly loses control as the protocol adapts to popular sentiment, locking them out entirely.
The Council is forced to recognize the new autonomous order. Citizens stage joyful gatherings declaring the end of BCI rule and a rebirth of city life.
